com.thesonofthom.maps

Class BmpHeaderMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.Buffer
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap
        • com.thesonofthom.maps.BmpHeaderMap

  • public class BmpHeaderMap
extends BufferMap
    Map to easily parse the BMP file format used by Windows. See the following for details on the structure of a BMP file:
    • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMP_file_format
    • http://www.fileformat.info/format/bmp/egff.htm
    • https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd183386(v=vs.85).aspx
    • https://forums.adobe.com/message/3272950#3272950
    • The file WinGDI.h
    Author:
    Kevin Thomson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitfieldMask
      Structure of the Bitfield Mask that optionally following a bmp that contians a BITMAPINFOHEADER DIB Header.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapCoreHeader
      Same as the BITMAPCOREHEADER struct.
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapFileHeader
      Map to parse the header of a potential BMP file to determine if it is, in fact, a bitmap
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapInfoHeader
      Same as the BITMAPINFOHEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV3InfoHeader
      Same as the BITMAPV3INFOHEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV4Header
      Same as the BITMAPV4HEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV5Header
      Same as the BITMAPV5HEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.CieXYZ
      Same as the CIEXYZ struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.CieXYZTriple
      Same as the CIEXYZTRIPLE struct.
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.ColorSpaceType
      Possible values for the ColorSpace field in the BITMAPV4HEADER
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.CompressionType
      Possible values for the Compression field in the BITMAPINFOHEADER
      class  BmpHeaderMap.DIBHeader
      Base class for all different DIB Header types.
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.DIBHeaderSize
      The Size field in the DIB Header determines what data will follow it BITMAPV3INFOHEADER - BITMAPV5INFOHEADER simply expand upon the previous header.
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.RenderingIntent
      Possible values for the Intent field in the BITMAPV5HEADER
      class  BmpHeaderMap.RGBQuad
      Same as the RGBQUAD struct.

    • Method Detail

      • buildBmpFileHeaderMap

        public static BmpHeaderMap buildBmpFileHeaderMap(java.io.File file)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        builds a BmpHeaderMap that parses the input file. Will first only read the necessary amount of data to determine if the file is in fact a BMP before reading the rest of the file
        Parameters:
        file - file to parse
        Returns:
        a BmpHeaderMap object if the file is in fact a BMP
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be read
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file is not a BMP file
